AI Agent Capabilities
JSON API GitHub

What can AI coding agents actually do?

A structured, continuously-maintained database of capabilities across Claude Code, GitHub Copilot, and Gemini CLI — with verified source citations for every entry.

Built for developers evaluating tools and for LLMs that need accurate capability context to give good advice.

For AI assistants
https://earchibald.github.io/ai-agent-capabilities/api/v1/index.json

Point your LLM at this to give it accurate, up-to-date capability context. The endpoint is self-describing and links to all data.
